DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Vehicle-Controlled , Parallel-Design , Multiple-Site , Phase III Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety DSXS topical product Patients Mild Severe Scalp Psoriasis
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Clinical Study Patients With Mild Severe Scalp Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate therapeutic efficacy safety DSXS topical product ( Taro Pharmaceuticals , U.S.A. , Inc. ) compare Vehicle topical product ( Taro Pharmaceuticals , U.S.A. , Inc. ) patient mild severe scalp psoriasis .
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female 18 year age old . Females pregnant , lactate likely become pregnant study .
